item.title: Install SMTP server on Debian
item.description: This article will show how to install a SMTP server on Debian 11. Prerequisites Debian 11 A domain name Step 1: Setup SPF in DNS correctly You need to set up SPF and MX record to avoid getting blacklisted by other SMTP servers. If you are using the root domain you use an @ symbol else write then name of the subdomain. 10800 is the TTL (time to live) and then we need to set 3 records.
